name: Biplanes, dog fight
description:
Biplanes, Dog fight. Retro Arcade fighter pilot game.

Climb into your old fashion fighter plane and prepare for a wild dog fight, a battle for supremacy of the sky.

The planes are all pre WWII fighters, probably closer to World War I, but you'll still need quick reactions a good eye and a cracking aim to defeat the enemy air force.

You're out numbered ten to one, the other planes are faster and can turn quicker. You have one advantage ... you're an ace pilot, a hero, the top gun (Maverick wont be born for another 50 years) .

Now climb in to your biplane, chocks away, be brave and try to make it back for supper.
